      • createNewFile

        public void createNewFile​(org.apache.log4j.Logger logger)
        [Create a new file for the private class attribute file, assign to private class attribute fileCreated a boolean true if file is created.]
        Parameters:
        logger - A logger that indicates success or failure of creating a file.

      • writeTheLastStatusFromIssue

        public void writeTheLastStatusFromIssue​(java.util.List<RedmineIssue> resultingList,
                                        java.lang.Boolean excelFlag,
                                        org.apache.log4j.Logger logger)
        [Write the last status for each Issue, except if the Issue have only one status, if the Issue have only one status, write the status at the time of creation.]
        Parameters:
        resultingList - A list of RedmineIssue obtained by using RedmineUtils class.
        excelFlag - A boolean which specify if the output format of the file will be used in Excel Spreadsheet.
        logger - A logger object by Java which used to display errors in a separate file.

      • writeTheReopenedIssues

        public void writeTheReopenedIssues​(java.util.List<RedmineIssue> resultingList,
                                   java.lang.Boolean excelFlag,
                                   org.apache.log4j.Logger logger)
        [Writes Redmine objects that have changed from "resolved" status to "pending decision" status. Anomalies reopened.]
        Parameters:
        resultingList - A list of Redmine Issues objects.
        excelFlag - A Boolean that if true makes the file compatible with Excel.
        logger - Gives information about the final file.

      • getPathOsSeparator

        public static java.lang.String getPathOsSeparator()
        [Enable to write the filePath to save the file in the correct format depending on the operating system]
        Returns:
        slash for linux user, blackslash for windows user
